85900.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Free Lands of Moongoth Brochure provides an overview of the titled land, a stunning map of the region, a new prestige class native to the area, and a new Open Game License monster. New Prestige Class: S.T.O.R.M. A S.T.O.R.M. (Strategically Trained Operative for Reconnaissance Missions) is more than just an elite soldier; he is also an assassin, a spy, a scout, a political kidnapper and thief, a bodyguard, and even an occasional ambassador when the situation calls. He is armed with superior weapons and innate extraordinary abilities like fluid karma and pressure point disarm. Easily usable in any fantasy world, add a super-soldier/spy to your campaign today. New O.G.L. Monster: Skullscron A skullscron is a dead hero that has been transformed into a powerful type of undead, its body now a haven for vermin which may be unleashed to devastating effect. Surprise your players with this vicious monster.

85901.name: From Novice to Master: The Manual of Classes

rpgissuearticle.79124: Novice to Master Excerpt: Malkan Knight

85901.description:
From publisher blurb:

From Novice to Master: The Manual of Classes contains new adventuring classes that will easily fit into almost any fantasy campaign.

85902.name: AbraKIDdabra
85902.description:
Overview:
AbraKIDdabra is a card game of crazy spells and rules that you play on each other. If you make three mistakes and get caught you are out of the game. Last person left is the winner.

Basic Play:
Each player has two parts to their turn:
Part 1: Draw a "Simon Says" card and answer the question or follow the directions.
Part 2: Draw a "AbraKIDdabra" card and give it to another player. That player must follow the directions on that card for the duration of the game.

Players caught not following the rules or "AbraKIDdabra" cards in front of them are marked for the mistake and must turn the appropriate card face-down. When a player gets 3 marks or face-down cards, he or she is out of the game.

Published by Play All Day Games (makers of Curses!)

(information from the rules card inside the game.)

85903.name: Scirsevand's Black Dragon Scale
85903.description:
From publisher blurb:

Scirsevand's Black Dragon Scale is the second installment of the popular Masterwork Armor series by Heathen Oracle. The armor is meant to provide an exciting campaign feature in the way of a powerful artifact that does not imbalance the game. The dragon scale is useful as a riveting plot device which could be assembled over time (recommended), found as a complete set or scattered throughout a single dungeon, or worn by an archvillain. Although the armor is powerful, its wearer must be of sufficient level to access the armor's more impressive features. Thus, if an 8th level fighter were to don the complete set of armour, many of the most extraordinary features would be beyond his grasp. As the character gained more levels, he would be granted access to the armor's higher powers. Synergistic abilities also come into play as complementary pieces are worn together (both gauntlets, both sabatons, completed suit), etc. Armor abilities are closely tied to that of its draconic namesake.

85904.name: Fer & Flamme
85904.description:
User Summary

Fer & Flamme ("Iron & Flame") is a French computer roleplaying game developed by Hervé Lange. The once powerful realm of Thulynte is on the verge of civil war, and besieged by the minions of the mighty wizard Khâal. It's up to a band of heroes to restore order and defeat the forces of darkness.

Fer & Flamme is a party-based RPG, with rules heavily inspired by Dungeons & Dragons (character classes and levels, races, monsters). The player creates a party of five characters, distributing points between 4 traits (strength, intelligence, dexterity, wisdom) and choosing spells and equipment and sets out to explore Thulynte.

The game uses a system of icons for player input. The display switches between an overland map for travel, a first-person view when exploring cities, and a top-down tactical view for combat.

Fer & Flamme was huge for an Amstrad game, with a 40000 squares map and cities with more than 120 different locations, using all the space available on both sides of two floppies. A PC port was started by UBI Soft but abandoned when the main developer quit.

85905.description:
Fantasy Flight Games is pleased to announce Exodus, the second expansion for Battlestar Galactica: The Board Game! With three new options to add to your game, Exodus is a great way to expand on the accusations and mistrust that runs rampant in Battlestar Galactica.

You can choose to add any combination of the three new options included in Exodus. Crave more white-knuckle space dog-fighting? Incorporate the Cylon Fleet option. The Conflicted Loyalties option introduces new Loyalty Cards that will test even the most trustworthy allegiances. Finally, relive the emotional turmoil of the hit television series with the Ionian Nebula, which pits players against the various conflicting personalities aboard Galactica.

The Cylon Fleet option keeps the pressure intense by introducing the Cylon Fleet game board. This board makes sure that every Crisis Card drawn will result in some sort of enemy ship activity. Once the Cylon Pursuit Track reaches the end, the Cylon ships will transfer over to the main game board, surrounding Galactica. There’s little time for rest between assaults, so get out there and protect those civvies, fighter jockeys!

Alliances are put to the test in the Conflicted Loyalties option, where the new Final Five Loyalty Cards up the stakes and introduce penalties for revealing your fellow humans’ Loyalty Card. In addition, new Personal Goal Loyalty Cards present players with an incriminating task to undertake. If they don’t fulfill their goal, then they will cause Galactica to lose a resource at the end of the game. Will you raise suspicion by completing the damaging task, or will you lay low and hope your failures won’t condemn the rest of your crew?

Finally, with the Ionian Nebula option, familiar faces populate the fleet as allies, and can be encountered by visiting locations on Galactica. But beware! The Cylons can influence these non-player characters, compelling them to produce negative effects when encountered. Manage humanity’s conflicting personalities carefully... or infighting will leave you vulnerable!
85905.name: Battlestar Galactica: Exodus Expansion

85907.name: Lost Souls
85907.description:
From the publisher's website:
"According to ancient Mayan legend, a representative is chosen from the human race to play the Game of Lost Souls against the gods to guarantee that mankind passes into the new world.

The game is a battle of wits, strategy and luck. Understand your opponent’s choices and make wise ones of your own. The fate of humanity rests in your hands."

In this two-player game, points are scored by moving their 6 pieces to the center of the board. Each of 6 pieces have a different ability. Combat is a simple roll-off system, with powers modifying.

The game is not sold separately but comes with the young adult novel, Lost Souls: Burning Souls.

85909.name: Hurlements
85909.description:
User Summary

Hurlements is a horror adventure game designed by Yannick Cadin. It uses the same engine as Zombi, his previous game. This time, players lead Kane, a small-time thief who just got out of prison and his girlfriend Lorry. Kane's cell mate Alan told him about a stash of gold before dying and Kane and Lorry intend to find the loot. While driving to the location, their car break down in the middle of nowhere. Kane and Lorry must find the gold, repair their car and escape a pack of vicious werewolves.

The gameplay is the same as zombi: a system of icons used for managing the character's movements, actions, and inventory, a static image showing the current location, light RPG touches (characters can become tired or hungry), and a combat system consisting of moving the joystick left and right as fast as possible.

85910.name: Ogham

rpgseries.8103: Bardic Lore: The Journals of Amergin Ó Míl

85910.description:
From publisher blurb:

He said, "Ogham is a gift from the Mother Goddess to her children, the druids. She gave it to her son, Oghma, the Danann warrior-poet, and he in turn gave it to us. It is a language of nature, of magic. It is as deceptively simple as some notches on a rock, but it hides the secrets of creation." I told him I wanted to learn the secrets of ogham, thinking he would do as every other adult around me had always done, laugh and shoo me away. But he didn?t. "You are not a druid," he said, and my heart sunk. "You are a bard, a fili, and you must fulfill that destiny first. When you are a fili come back to see me, and I will teach you then." It was twenty-two years before I went back to study with Connor McCroghan, but he was still waiting for me, and indeed he taught me the secrets of ogham. And it is in his honor and memory that I created the ogham stone that today marks his resting place.
- From the journal of Amergin Ó Míl

Bardic Lore: Ogham details this ancient Irish written language for your d20 Fantasy game. Learn the history and myth of this once-secret language, and infuse your campaign with its runic magic, allowing druids to tap into the very magic of nature. Includes a short history, an ogham reference chart, notes on ogham magic and its place in the world, as well as magical ogham stones, two new feats, including the powerful Scribe Ogham, and Lore/Knowledge information.

85911.description:
Expansion for Zooloretto or Aquaretto, given for free by Abacus at Essen 2010.

Playing the game:

Please use the original rules with the following exceptions: the first player who fills his 6-space enclosure (Zooloretto) or places the sixth tile in one of his basins, takes the enclosure with the Octopus as a bonus* and places it below his zoo board, near his barn (Zooloretto) or near his water zoo board (Aquaretto). He immediately earns 4 coins, which he takes from the bank and must predict the player with the most points at the end of the game. If he is right, nothing happens. Otherwise he must pay back 2 coins. For each coin he cannot pay back he gets -1 point. Afterwards - as usual - the player with the most points is the winner. The Octopus enclosure remains with this player until the end of the game. The player may place no tiles in the Octopus enclosure.

*If Octopus is played with Grizzly, Polar Bear, and / or other similar expansions, the players filling their 6-space enclosures may select these enclosures in any order they want. If played with Aquaretto the player earns also a coin as usual.

(taken from the card)
85911.name: Zooloretto: Octopus

85912.name: Ríastradh

rpgseries.8103: Bardic Lore: The Journals of Amergin Ó Míl

85912.description:
From publisher blurb:

His mouth foamed as he tore the shirt from his back, and as he rushed forward to meet the mass of Sea Devils that had attacked us, he started to grow, taller than a house, wider than three bulls. His skin bubbled from within like tar bursting from the earth, and his muscles stretched into dimensions unnatural to humans. His right arm grew to the size of a thick oak tree trunk, and with every swing he slashed three Fomorians in half. His hair stood on end like a halo of spears, and from each tip burst a mist of blood and rage that choked any who came too close to him. One hundred Fomorian died that afternoon at the hands of Bran, the warped one, hero of Daingean, and I was never able to look at my foster brother the same way again.
- From the journal of Amergin Ó Míl

Bardic Lore: Riastradh introduces the fantastic and terrifying heroic feat of the warp spasm to your d20 Fantasy game. Included are rules for creating a warped hero, the rules of the riastradh, new feats and the warped one paragon class, along with a fully-stated NPC and Bardic Lore information.

85913.name: The Fachan

rpgseries.8103: Bardic Lore: The Journals of Amergin Ó Míl

85913.description:
From publisher blurb:

I turned around, intent on facing my enemy and instead I faced my nightmares. In front of me stood a creature fully a head taller than I, its single, bloodshot eye staring at me with all the hatred in the world. It had a broad and muscled body with a single arm jutting from the center of its chest, and a single, powerful leg, propelling it forth towards me. I can honestly say I hope to never run into a fachan ever again.
- From the journal of Amergin Ó Míl

Bardic Lore: The Fachan details a new creature for your d20 Fantasy game from the pages of Celtic myth, the fachan. Included are stats for this fearsome creature, info on the fachan as a character race, the fachan paragon class, a fully-stated NPC to threaten your players, and Lore/Knowledge check information.

85914.name: The Villa of Mysteries

rpgseries.8103: Bardic Lore: The Journals of Amergin Ó Míl

85914.description:
From publisher blurb:

We first crossed a fancy gate that marked the entrance to the estate. Tall, spear-like trees—cypresses, I was informed—created a natural fence around the vast property and stood as soldiers flanking the path that led up to the villa proper. As we got closer, pairs of statues of creatures I’d only heard of in the myths of the invaders replaced the cypresses: centaur, pegasus, medusa, and the god they called Bacchus in a central and prominent spot right in front of the entrance to the house. A dark-haired, olive-skinned woman, Mirella Valerianus, unmistakably the mistress of the estate, awaited our carriage with a veritable army of servants. [...] Early the next morning we were escorted to our carriages by the lady Mirella, who extended personal, private invitations to the Ard Righ and myself to return at any moment to the villa, whether on an official function or not. As we pulled away, and I turned back to see the olive-skinned beauty waving us farewell, I thought I may just have to take her up on her offer.
— From the journal of Amergin Ó Míl

Bardic Lore: The Villa of Mysteries details an Imperial-style villa for your d20 Fantasy game. Learn the history of the villa, its association to the cult of Bacchus, and the secrets it hides within its walls. Includes a history, a detailed tour of the villa, important NPCs, a new creature, a new spell and Lore/Knowledge information.

85915.name: Forest Dwellers
85915.description:
From publisher blurb:

This chapter of the codex details the paragons of the forest dwellers, those races that make their home among the thick and primeval woodlands. Hence are presented the mighty centaur, powerful protector of his tribe; the bewitching dryad, a fae who animates the trees to do her bidding; the feral wild elf, invincible in battle with his cooshee companion; the reclusive wood elf, master of stealth in the forest; the jovial forest gnome, companion to wildlife and enemy to goblinkind; and the lusty satyr, master musician and bon vivant extraordinaire.

85916.name: Sun & Sea Dwellers
85916.description:
From publisher blurb:

This chapter of the codex details the paragons of the sun & sea dwellers, those races that make their home in the depths of the oceans and under the warmth of the day star. Hence are presented the always-ready aquatic elf, the reclusive and mystic grey elf, the complex and powerful sun elf, the jolly and lucky halfling, the elfin-like tallfellow halfling, the endlessly versatile human, the friendly yet ferocious merfolk, the deadly sahuagin and the deceptive malenti sahuagin.

85917.name: Erzsak's Drake Riders
85917.description:
From publisher blurb:

Erzsak’s Drake Riders is a mercenary company of warriors-for-hire featuring a small army of foot soldiers and specialists, all acting as support for the company’s shock troops, the firedrake riders. Founded by a discontented ex-soldier named Ludvel Erzsak, the group has evolved from a one-time adventuring band to a grand organization with both might and reputation.

Erzsak's Drake Riders details a drop-in mercenary company for your d20 Fantasy game, complete with history, tenets, organizational structures, ways of hiring, ways of joining, iconic and generic NPCs. It also includes 14 new feats dealing with mounted combat in general—from Mount Specialization to Riding Mastery, from Great Trample to Deathly Charge—and a new creature, the fierce firedrake.

85918.name: Scions of the Holy Triad
85918.description:
From publisher blurb:

Eschewing the idea of a fractured pantheon in which each deity stands on its own, the Scions of the Holy Triad, a group of warrior-priests venerating equally the gods of War, Fortune and Protection, seek to return to a golden age when the gods were worshipped in unison and their strengths combined for the betterment of the mortal realm. Though a young group in the land, the Scions have made an impact, drawing to their ranks a community of like-minded individuals bent on uniting the worship of the gods, as well as the enmity of those opposed to their goals.

Scions of the Holy Triad details a drop-in organization for your d20 Fantasy game, complete with history, tenets, organizational structures, ways of joining, and ready-to-use NPCs. It also includes a new prestige class—the Triad Scion—a new feat, a new exotic weapon, three new domains and four new spells, including two spell variants.

85919.name: The Blind Path
85919.description:
From publisher blurb:

Though called by some a monastic order, the Blind Path is really a simple-yet-deep philosophy teaching its followers to see beyond the visible, beyond the obvious, in order to experience a new and transcendental reality. Developed by a woman who, through the machinations of fate, found herself in need of a new "vision" in life, the Blind Path hides within its ideals secrets that allow the blind to go beyond their physical limitations and become one of the Unsighted.

The Blind Path comes with the Campaign Planner's Secret Society/Organization forms already filled for this organization, giving you all the important facts in one handy sheet.

The Blind Path details a drop-in organization for your d20 Fantasy game, complete with history, tenets, ways of joining, iconic and generic NPCs. It also includes a new prestige class, the Unsighted, which allows blind characters a chance to discover a whole new range of abilities, as well as a new feat.

85920.name: The Dream Healers
85920.description:
From publisher blurb:

Though often seen as a priestly order, the dream healers follow no set god. For them, the power of healing lies within the patient and their dreams. Able to enter another's dreams, they guide their patients through past events, allowing them to relive them and heal many wounds that other healers cannot touch. The journey is not without risk, for the world within a dream becomes a new reality, and death there comes just as easily as in the waking world.

The Dream Healers is a 9-page ebook detailing a drop-in organization for your 3rd Fantasy (3.5 Fantasy) game, complete with history, tenets, organizational structures, ways of joining, and ready-to-use NPCs. It also includes the dream healer prestige class and two new magical items.

85921.name: The Wayfinders of Talus
85921.description:
From publisher blurb:

While most gods are honored by a formal church and clerical order, Talus, the god of travel and safe voyages, prefers the service of his Wayfinders. The organization was founded over 200 years ago by a group of caravan guards who were saved from bandits and other perils on their journey by a priest of Talus. Upon arrival at their destination the priest disappeared, though not before he had imparted much of the wisdom of Talus to the guards. Today, Wayfinders are found everywhere, aiding travelers as cartographers, guides, protectors, and explorers.

The Wayfinders of Talus is an 8-page ebook detailing a drop-in organization for your 3rd Fantasy (3.5 Fantasy) game, complete with history, tenets, organizational structures, ways of joining, and ready-to-use NPCs. It also includes the pathfinder prestige class, two new spells and two new feats.

user comment

The product was initially titled The Pathfinders of Talus and was changed with the advent of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.

85922.description: Two expansion tiles(three times each as the original improvements) offered at the booth of the "Östereichisches Spielemuseum" at Essen 2010. These replace two of the eight types of improvement available in the game adding additional variabilty.
85922.name: Grand Cru: Heuriger und gemischter Satz

85923.name: The Pneumaphagoi
85923.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Pneumaphagoi, or the Eaters of Spirits, are a loose organization of individuals that share one bizarre common activity: eating ghosts. Learned from ancient texts or from begrudging tutors, the secrets of trapping and consuming spirits yield numerous benefits, and thus appeal to people with a wide variety of motives. For some it is the thrill of consuming an exotic substance, which like all highs is fleeting and ever more elusive; for others it is the power, which quickly fades. The promise of longevity draws some, although the added years can be gray and thin. Others have more noble motives in their quest to destroy the undead, a nobleness that is quickly clouded by the addictive nature of the task. Many are the paths to becoming an Eater, few that lead away.

The Pneumaphagoi is an 11-page PDF detailing a drop-in organization for your d20 Fantasy game, complete with history, tenets, organizational structures, ways of joining, and ready-to-use NPCs. It also includes six new feats, two new spells, two new incantations, and all the necessary rules to bring spirit eating into your campaign along with the possible consequences.

85924.name: Police Investigation
85924.description:
From publisher blurb:

Crime Scene: Police Investigation tells you everything you need to know about the Police, FIrst, police structures, procedures and training. Then all you need for solving a crime, from processing a crime scene to collectin evidence to determining the motives and MOs. Learn all about the appraising a suspect, handling the media, managing jurisdictions and eating donuts.

85925.description:
Fresco: Expansion Modules 4, 5 and 6 consists of, as the name suggests, three additional expansions for Fresco! They can be played individually or combined with any or all other expansions for the game. These expansions are:


4. The Wishing Well – Throw a coin into the wishing well and you will receive an extra benefit. You might find a purse in the theatre and receive a reward for its return, or a friendly marketer will present you an extra paint.



5. The Gold Leaf – At some market booths you can receive gold leaf to intensify the shine of your paint. The bishop will be thrilled!



6. The Glaziers – As an additional action, you can buy glass in different colors and build windows in the Cathedral. Even the plain-looking parts of the fresco will appear now in a dazzling light.
85925.name: Fresco: Expansion Modules 4, 5 and 6

85926.name: Solace
85926.description:
From the official website:

Solace is an interactive aesthetic experience utilizing dynamic audio and bullet hell overtones to provide a unique perspective on the five stages of grief. Developed by One Man Down, a game team from the DigiPen Institute of Technology.

85927.description: From the package pack: This expansion adds 10 new cards including an eighth character - Madame Wong complete with a few extra navigation cards, love and hate cards and a few doses of the liquid courage card. You must have Lifeboat to play.
85927.name: Lifeboat Expansion #2: Liquid Courage

85928.name: Puff Puff
85928.description:
Gameplay

Use the awesome superpower of diodon holocanthus, the spiny puffer, to navigate two beautiful underwater worlds. Requires skill and precision to master the art of buoyancy control and stay alive!
This game allows you to use your iPhone’s multi-touch feature in a new and exciting way!
With stunning 2D and 3D art based on real-life, you’ll get the chance to explore underwater worlds without getting wet!!
The retro music and sound effects promise to lift your mood instantly!!!

Features


Unique pinch and stretch multi-touch control
Challenging physics-based gameplay
Addictive survival game mode
Extra lives, speed, and invincibility power-ups
3D animation, detailed underwater landscape
Synthy 8-bit sound effects and music that escalates with gameplay
Big Oil protestors, sea life, sunken ships, pirate treasure
Arcade style online worldwide leaderboards via OpenFeint, the largest social gaming network on the iPhone!


Source: The Developer Website.

85929.name: La Chose de Grotemburg
85929.description:
User Summary

La Chose de Grotemburg ("The Thing From Grotemburg") is a French satyrical horror adventure game. Germaine, the main character's wife, is found brutally murdered in her kitchen and it's up to the player to find out who or what killed her and take action.

The game is typical of graphical adventure games of the era: a display showing the location the player is at, some narrative text and a text interface where the player input commands (like "OPEN CUPBOARD").

Though marketed as a horror game, La Chose de Grotemburg features a lot of comedy elements, from the names of the places to the answers of the text interpreter.

85930.name: Radio Allergy Noa
85930.description:
Radirgy: Noir, also called Radirgy: Noa, is a vertically-scrolling shoot 'em up for the NAOMI arcade platform and the sequel to Radilgy. It was released in February 25, 2010 in Japan for the Wii, distributed by LUCKY Co. LTD. It features a cel-shaded graphical style very similar to that of its predecessor and 2-player co-op. Screen orientation is horizontal.

Source: Wikipedia, "Radirgy: Noir", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85931.name: Australian Realms (Issue 26 - Dec/Jan 1995/6)
85931.description:
From contents page:

Warzone Poster
Doomtrooper, The Crow and Supernova Cards: A swag of goodies from Heartbreaker Hobbies
Olympus: Official Cyberpunk SolSpace adventure in the teeming Mars colony
The Grim Forest of Masabor: Sequel to the Lonely Halls of Hra Kurban. The perilous journey continues
Dark Night: A tale of prejudice and betrayal set in the Realms fantasy world
Getting the Most out of you Metahuman: Character creation hints for FASA's Shadowrun game
Women of the East: Two more historically-based female character role models explored
Hidden Agendas: Campaign starters for Chaosium's modern horror RPG - Nephilim
Readers Poll 1996: You tell us where to go in 1996
Editorial/Letters
Reviews
Analytical Engine
News

85932.name: Tensions
85932.description:
User Summary

Tensions is a poker simulation.

The game features two difficulty levels and can accomodate up to four players (AI and/or humans). One noticeable feature of the game is the display, which show the faces of the computer opponents. Each of them has a different set of facial expressions and will react differently to in-game events, and part of the game is learning to read the computer opponents' reactions.

85933.name: Australian Realms (Issue 27 - Feb/Mar 1996)
85933.description:
From contents page:

Free! Kult Poster (inserted in the magazine is an apology for the Kult poster not arriving in time to be included)
The Forester Knight: An adventure for Chaosium's game of chivalry and magic - Pendragon
Pirates of the Maroklara: Source article for Unae, the Australian Realms fantasy campaign setting
Trevor's Terrible Teapot: A whimsical adventure hook for your fantasy roleplaying game
The Times, They are a Changing: How to introduce the constant of change in you campaign
Blood Red: Revealing more secrets of Mars in the Cyberpunk SolSpace campaign
The United Catholic Church: Unofficial source material for FASA's Shadowrun game
Roleplaying in 3D: For starting referees, how to improve your encounter descriptions
Editorial/Letters
Game Reviews
Book Reviews
That was the News

85934.name: NHL 2K11
85934.description:
NHL 2K11 marks 2K Sports’ third ground-breaking hockey release on Wii. Taking video game hockey to a new level, improved Wii MotionPlus control brings revolutionary puck skills to your Wii Remote with the ability to execute real-time (one-to-one) dekes, puck juggling, shooting and defensive maneuvers. Bringing these incredible moves to life are improved player models, freshly lit and redesigned arenas, and highly detailed jerseys and equipment. Completing the package and making this the deepest hockey experience available on Wii, 2K Sports introduces the all-new Road to the Cup mode featuring Mii characters battling in mini-games, trivia challenges and skills competitions. With even more authentic hockey action than before including broken sticks, more responsive skating and improved A.I., NHL 2K11 is sure to score big with Wii gamers this season!

Source: The Game Website.
User Summary:

The iPhone version is a slimmed down version of the game, with simplified controls and fewer maneuvers and game modes. Much of the heart of the game is maintained by the release, however.

85935.name: Australian Realms (Issue 28 - May/Jun 1996)
85935.description:
From contents page:

Free! Kult Poster
Lourn's Rest: A fantasy horror adventure with Celtic undead for Earthdawn & AD&D
Wair-Rae: The Fifth Elven Dominion: Forwao shows us the Uane elves. A preview of the Wair-Rae sourcebook
On This Day...: A lot happens in a typical day in Uane, and it is not all doom and gloom
The Belt: Come visit the wild frontier of Cyberpunk SolSpace - the Asteriod belt
Armed and Dangerous: The weapons and armour of fantasy RPG city slickers
I Love the Smell of Napalm in a Space Hulk: How to win at this classic boardgame form Games Workshop.
The Templars: More unofficial source material for the church in FASA's Shadowrun
Editorial/Letters
Game Reviews
Book Reviews
That was the News

85936.name: NBA 2K11

videogamehonor.31208: 2010 Spike Best Sports Game of the Year Winner

85936.description:
Game Summary:

When you’re the #1 selling NBA videogame two years in a row, the #1 rated NBA videogame 10 years in a row*, and have collaborated with back-to-back NBA champions, Kevin Garnett (2K9) and Kobe Bryant (2K10) – what is NBA 2K11 to do for thenext act? Simple: Michael Jordan. The greatest basketball player of all time debuts for the first time in this hardware generation and brings his passion for the game to NBA 2K11 with an all new Jordan Challenge mode, historic Bulls teams, and even a MJ: Creating a Legend mode offering gamers the chance to be a rookie Michael and craft a new career for him. This is on top of improvements to core gameplay elements – including an all-new IsoMotion™ dribbling controls, deeper My Player mode with new My Career feature, all-new breathtaking visuals, and much more. This year BECOME THE GREATEST with NBA 2K11.

Features:

Jordan Challenge – Relive 10 different legendary games from Michael Jordan’s career and replicate in NBA 2K11 what MJ did on the court. Successfully reenact all 10 game scenarios to unlock the MJ: Creating a Legend mode.

Historic Chicago Bulls Teams – Ever wondered how the Lakers of today might fare against the Michael Jordan led Chicago Bulls? Get the chance to play as some of the greatest teams in NBA history as the 1985-86, 1989-90, 1990-91, 1991-92, 1994-95, 1995-96, 1996-97, and 1997-98 Chicago Bulls squads are put at your fingertips in Quick Game mode.

My Jordans– While playing through NBA 2K11, users will be awarded pairs of Air Jordans for hitting game milestones and accomplishments. Collect the entire line of Air Jordan shoes that MJ wore throughout his career and gain specific attribute bonuses when you have them equipped.

MJ: Creating a Legend – Complete the Jordan Challenge to unlock this special mode where you get to take control of a newly drafted rookie Michael Jordan and craft your own version of Michael’s career in the NBA.

ALL-NEW IsoMotion™ Dribbling Controls - Delivering the most realistic feeling and reacting dribbling system to date with seamless transitions between ankle breaking moves. Coupled with an all-new gesturing system allowing users to intuitively translate thought to motion and dominate like Michael Jordan from the perimeter to the paint.

ALL-NEW Dynamic Shot Control – Take your offensive game to the next level with an unprecedented amount of control via the enhanced Shot Stick™. Dozens of new shot types, from layups to jumpshots to dunks and everything in between, are completely under the user’s control with the flick of a stick. The new Shot Branching system also allows you to adjust your shots on the fly in mid-air just like MJ and ensures that you're never stuck in long drawn out animations.

BEST NBA 2K Soundtrack EVER – The GREATEST soundtrack to date featuring an eclectic mix of upcoming breakout bands and highly acclaimed hip-hop artists such as Big Boi, Drake, and even an original, exclusive track from 12 time Grammy nominee, Snoop Dogg.

Plus, look for more news soon about great enhancement coming to other core features like My Player and Association modes as well as NBA Today.

Source: The Game Website.

85937.name: Crimson Sea
85937.description:
User summary:

This mission based action-adventure is set in the solar system Theophilus, in the distant future. You play the role of Sho, a private detective. Early on in the game you are drafted by the Intergalactic Agency of the Galaxy, and quickly become the leader of special G squadron whose purpose is to protect Theophilus from the invasion of an alien race called Mutons.

Travel around the six planets of the solar system, in a plethora of surroundings, including a vast desert, an underwater metropolis and a floating city. Fight against overwhelming odds, as over a thousand enemies converge upon you at once. Blast through them using your improving abilities, state-of-the-art customizable weapons and powerful psionic energy blasts. Can you save humanity from extincton?

85938.name: Ordalie
85938.description:
Ordalie is a two player game in which they are knights who fight each other.

Both players have a deck of cards 1-12, at the beginning of a round each player discards two cards. After this each player plays one card face down and then they reveal it together. The highest card wins (with 2 exceptions). And he hits his opponent. Then the player has to choose in secret which part of his opponents body he will hit. First he chooses from two cards (left and right) and then from three cards (head, torso, legs), giving him a place and a height to hit. His opponent may try to defend and also chooses these cards. Then they both reveal their cards. If they both played the same cards, nothing happens, if their is no card corresponding then the opponent gets full damage. When one card corresponds he gets 'half' damage. He puts this on his damage board (left side head, right side head, left side torso, right side torso, left leg, right leg), On each is a score track when the score track reaches the maximum the fight is lost. If no maximum damage is obtained a new round starts (a fight takes 3 rounds maximum.

85939.name: ROLLE|SPIL (Issue 2 - Summer 2010)
85939.description:
Second issue of ROLLE|SPIL.

Cover photo by Daniel Benjamin B. Clausen.

85940.name: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire (Gold Edition)
85940.description:
Back of the Game Cover

Special features


The primary objective of the game is to create large, lively medieval towns.
The settlers interact with each other in a completely natural way and have wants and needs of their own.
Female settlers appear for the first time in the series: Men and women fall in love with each other and marry.
The lively, detailed game world is rich in animal and plant life.
The settlers' busy life is presented in lovingly rendered animations that show what is going on in a transparent way.
The world is divided into four climatic zones with changes of season and weather which influence expansion and resource gathering.
The game's instant accessibility and gentle learning curve ensure long-lasting fun; even in advanced game missions, new features are introduced.
All interventions by the player are reflected in the behaviour of his subjects and made transparent through the animations in the game world.
Starting with a small settlement, the player builds up flourishing towns, maintains trade relations, and claims land and villages. This requires diplomatic skills.
Mining, gathering resources, and food production result from wise planning and the various occupations of the settlers.
Goods transport is optimised through skilful road planning.
Upgrading buildings step-by-step improves the effectiveness of the economy and towns.
By hiring travelling entertainers and organizing fairs, the player acts as a matchmaker by enabling male and female settlers to get to know each other.
The player can build walls to protect his towns from enemy attacks. In military actions, the player must prove that he has built up his empire in such a way that it can defend itself effectively.
Missions featuring noble knights with various skills accompany the player through the epic storyline penned by Jeff Grubb.
Dynamic single player campaign
Freeplay mode with a multitude of maps
Numerous multiplayer options via LAN and Internet
Includes a map editor

85941.name: ROLLE|SPIL (Issue 3 - Autumn 2010)
85941.description:
Third issue of ROLLE|SPIL.

Cover photo by Christina Molbech.

85944.description:
The Expansion Pack for Fzzzt adds material for a 5th and a 6th player and 8 cards for the conveyor belt deck.

So the exansions consists of:
4 starting cards for the 5th player
4 starting cards for the 6th player
8 conveyor belt deck cards: 2 production units, 1 Fzzzt, 1 robot upgrade, 4 robot cards

In a 5-6 player game there are only 4 auction rounds instead of 5
(12 cards in the conveyor belt rather than 8 in the standard game)
In a 2-4 player game one can choose a longer game (6 auction rounds instead of 5) by adding the 8 additional cards to the conveyor belt deck.

There are no important changes in the rules.
85944.name: Fzzzt! Expansion Pack

85945.description:
From the leaflet that comes with the game:

Instead of using the two standard heroes from the base game (the Officer and the Warrior), the Defender can choose to draw two random heroes from among the ten new ones available in this expansion.

The expansion is 10 heroes (5 Double-faced Cards )in a zip lock bag and an A5 size sheet of rules.
85945.name: Stronghold: Heroes

85947.name: Crimson Sea 2
85947.description:
User summary:

Crimson Sea 2 is a mission based action-adventure game with an involving storyline and unprecedented gameplay in which you will experience a mixture of shoot-em-up and role play features. In this sequel to Crimson Sea you get to again play the role of Sho, though you have a choice of a different character called Feanay if you wish. The story evolves in the Theophilus solar system and this time you are called to confront your own demons as well as a new menace that threatens humanity with extinction. You need to make resourceful use of every bit of help you can get in order to successfully eliminate this new threat. You can personalize and upgrade your weapons with the help of power ups, switch characters and witness amazing graphics and incredible cut scenes.

85948.description:
In Scho K.O., players place tiles with white and black chocolate squares on two layers, trying to create the largest connected region of their own color. Smarties on the tiles both permit and block the placement of overlapping squares on the second layer, adding an extra level of play.

Scho K.O. is similar to Schokoly, but is for only two players and consequently has only two colors of chocolate and red specials printed on the tiles.
85948.name: Scho K.O.

85949.name: Relics
85949.description:
Publisher:

The whims of a spoilt king can cause nations to crumble... but the arrogance of the ancients could split the world in half. Some seek decadent comfort in the pain and suffering while others pound the drums of war to fight the oppression. Where will your adventures take you?

Relics is tabletop wargame set on the unique world of Relicia. Supported by a range of models in the 30mm scale (where a models of a 6 foot tall person would be 30mm tall from the base of the models foot to the models eye). Each of the races of Relicia has a highly distinctive feel; both in terms of look and play.

85950.name: ASL Open '96 Scenario Pack
85950.description:
At the ASL Open in 1996 the Windy City Wargamers issued a full color ten scenario pack.

Will to Fight... Eradicated has the SS attempting to stop a Polish counter-attack in house to house fighting in Poland 1939.

Scotch on the Rocks has Scottish Highlanders trying to dislodge German infantry from a hilltop as the battle for Tunisia begins to wind down.

Tigers at Merefa features a mixed German force of Tigers and Panzergrenadiers attempting to silence a Russian artillery position near Kharkov in 1943.

Cat Becomes the Mouse depicts a German attempt to bypass a British position in an armored slugfest during the D-Day invasion.

Abandon Ship has a weak American infantry force attempting to delay a combined arms German attack force during the Battle of the Bulge.

Los Ejercitos Nuevos pits the Republicans against the Nationalists during the Spanish Civil War.

Eye of the Tiger has a desperate group of Germans tanks and infantry counterattacking Russian combined forces as Operation Bagration winds down.

The Last VC in Europe depicts a local German counter-attack against British forces in Germany with less than three weeks left in the war in Europe.

Sweep Up has a frozen German relief team trying to re-open a supply route at the height of the Russian counter-offensive at the gates of Moscow in 1941.

Stand And Die features a combined arms conflict in the Chapei province in China as the Japanese attempt to dislodge the Chinese defenders in 1937.

85951.name: Contra 4

videogamefranchise.20389: Konami the Best (Best Selling Konami Games, JP)

videogamehonor.31830: 2007 Game Critics Best Handheld Game of the Year Nominee

85951.description:
Contra 4 is a 2D action game for the Nintendo DS and the eleventh original installment in the Contra series.

The plot is set in 2638, two years after the events of Contra III. With the Red Falcon alien threat defeated and Alien Wars finished, the Earth is peaceful once again. However, a similar alien entity calling itself Black Viper begins launching attacks against the human race, causing mass destruction over the planet. After strange readings are detected at the Galuga archipelago (the setting of the original Contra), the Earth Federation sends their four strongest Contra Force commandos on a final strike mission to destroy the Black Viper and its army of aliens, robots, and mutants.

Contra 4 is based on the same 2D gameplay system featured in the series through Contra III: The Alien Wars, ignoring many of the game mechanics introduced in later games such as the fixed weapon configurations in Contra: Shattered Soldier and Neo Contra, returning to the old method of picking up power-up icons to obtain new weapons. The play controls are similar to Contra III, including the ability to hold two weapons in inventory. The action spans both screens of the Nintendo DS system and a grappling hook can be used by the player's character to latch onto railings, allowing the player's character to move from one screen to the other. Similarly to the arcade version of Super Contra, the player can pick up the same power-up twice, giving them an improved version of the same weapon. The player can also discard a power-up, allowing them to try out a new weapon without losing a previous one, or give the power-up to another player.

In addition to the standard side view stages, there are also tunnel stages similar to the two "3D view" stages from the original Contra, in which the perspective shifts behind the character's back. The action in these stages is displayed solely on the upper screen, while the bottom screen is used to display the stage's map and the locations of power-ups. Other than using both screens and two-card ad hoc cooperative play, Contra 4 makes no usage of the DS' special features such as touch screen (besides navigating the main menu), microphone, or single card multiplayer.

Source: Wikipedia, "Contra 4," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85952.name: SRAM
85952.description:
User Summary

SRAM is a graphical text adventure game by Serge Hauduc, Ludovic Hauduc and Jacques Hemonic. King Egres IV, the ruler of the planet SRAM has been overthrown by the High Priest Cinomeh and is held with the royal family in the dungeons below the Temple of the Two Moons. The player, a random human from planet Earth, is teleported to SRAM and must find out who sent him here and for what purposes. A cryptic poem about the witch Edualc scribbled on a stone nearby is the only clue the player has.

SRAM is a classic adventure game, it uses a text parser for player input and vector graphics to display the various locations. It's engine was reused for other games, including the sequel, SRAM 2.

85953.name: Roshambo Champion
85953.description:
A free single-player print-and-play, this game is less about actual rock-paper-scissors and more about being in a crooked Rock-Paper-Scissors (Roshambo) tournament! Exploit your opponents' weaknesses while working around your own crippling disadvantages. When that doesn't work, cheat or bribe the officials!

The game PDF is available in the files section, or can be downloaded from here.

Gameplay:
In this game you generate some simple stats for yourself, then face opponents like "The Copycat", "The Randomizer", and "The Cheat" in a simulated blind ladder-style elimination. Which opponents are dangerous and which ones are pushovers will be different every game. When the going looks too rough, either cheat to give yourself an edge or bribe the officials to change the lineup and hope the opponent you dodged gets eliminated before they match back up with you. But don't get carried away... you don't have enough money and sneakiness to fix every match.

85954.name: Professor Noggin's History of Art
85954.description:
Learn to appreciate the highest achievements of civilization. Professor Noggin's series of educational games encourages kids to learn interesting facts about their favorite subjects. Each of the thirty game cards combines trivia, true or false, and multiple choice questions about the history of art.

Card topics include:
Leonardo da Vinci
Michelangelo
Sculpture
Painting Techniques and Materials
The Renaissance
Italian Renaissance
Rembrandt
Monet
Picasso
Impressionists and Post-Impressonists
World Architecture
Ancient Greek and Roman Art
Ancient Egyptian Art
Mary Cassat
Byzantine Art
Baroque
Rubens
American Art
Canadian Art
Modern Art
Musee de Louvre
Art Museums of the United States
Andy Warhol
Who Am I?
Name This Masterpiece

85955.name: Professor Noggin's Presidents of the United States
85955.description: Learn about the important people who helped shape and lead the United States. Professor Noggin's series of educational games encourages kids to learn interesting facts about their favorite subjects. Each of the thirty game cards combines trivia, true or false, and multiple choice questions about the presidents of the United States.

85957.name: Professor Noggin's Baseball
85957.description: Learn all about one of North America's favorite past-times. Professor Noggin's series of educational games encourages kids to learn interesting facts about their favorite subjects. Each of the thirty game cards combines trivia, true or false, and multiple choice questions about the history, rules and traditions of baseball.

85958.name: Treasure Planet: Battle at Procyon
85958.description:
User Summary

"The Ultimate Real Time Naval Space Battle"

You command a fleet of ships which battle it out in real time against opposing fleets using cannon, boarding parties and manouvering in 3-D space.

There are two modes of play. One is an action adventure in which you take the part of Jim Hawkins as he seeks to defend the Queen's Empire against enemies ranging from Space Pirates to Ironclads.

The second option is to play against the AI or other friends over a LAN or the internet, assembling and controlling your fleet.

85959.name: Professor Noggin's Hockey
85959.description: Professor Noggin's series of educational games encourages kids to learn interesting facts about their favorite subjects. Each of the thirty game cards combines trivia, true or false, and multiple choice questions about ice hockey.

85960.name: SRAM 2
85960.description:
User Summary

In this sequel to SRAM, the player is once again teleported from Earth to the planet SRAM, this time under the control of the High Priest Cinomeh. King Egres IV has become a tyrant, and the player's goal (under the influence of Cinomeh) is to kill the king.

SRAM 2 uses the same engine as its prequel: a text parser for player input and vector graphics for the display. Like other contemporary French adventure games, SRAM 2 added comedy elements to its fantasy story.

85961.name: Lords of Chaos
85961.description:
User Summary

Lords of Chaos is a fantasy strategy game for one to four players. Each player takes control of a wizard and uses his magical abilities to fulfil his objectives. The main objective is to survive until a portal appears and then escape through it to 'Limbo'. There are three scenarios provided which represent different worlds. The one player game combines startegy with role play. A Wizard Designer programe is provided to name and design your own wizards. Successful completion of a scenario will enable you to spend 'Experience Points' on improving yoru wizard in the next world.

It used a turn based system with action points spent on spells, movement and so on. Many of the spells summon creatures to fight for you so an army can be built up to fight for you.

85962.name: Naval Ops: Warship Gunner
85962.description:
User summary:

Naval Ops: Warship Gunner is a turn based naval simulation war game. You start out commanding a World War II German, British, Japanese or American destroyer, but find yourself in the midst of an electrical storm which creates a vortex to a parallel universe. The two major forces of this parallel world, The Freedom Forces and the Empire, are entangled in an all out war.

Siding yourself with the Freedom Forces you have to take on 40 missions of increasing difficulty against the Empire. At the end of every tenth mission you have to confront and destroy a powerful boss, including a huge super plane and an almost invincible super submarine. At the end of every mission you gain money and points. The former can be used to buy parts or invest in the development of five technological areas: Metallurgy, engines, weapons, aircraft and electronics. The latter can be used to purchase crew promotions.

You do have the opportunity to change, modify or even build and customize your very own ship. Alternative ships include the Cruiser, the Battleship, the Aircraft Carrier and the Battlecarrier. There are hundreds of available parts and weapons, both conventional and unconventional such as lasers.

Naval Ops: Warship Gunner is an overall very interesting and addictive game which is bound to keep you sitting at the edge of your seat for long hours.

85963.name: Knowledge Arcana (Issue 5 -  Spring 2006)
85963.description:
Issue 5 for Knowledge Arcana

Cover art by; Storn J. Cook

85964.description:
This small expansion consists of two Alien Tech cards named 'Space Crane'.

The card enables you to steal 4 Fuel/Ore from the stock or to take an Alien Tech card from the Alien Artifact instead of stealing from other players.

This expansion was included exclusively to all who supported the game through Kickstarter.com.
85964.name: Alien Frontiers: The Space Crane

85965.name: Seikiheikuu
85965.description:
This is strategic level wargame for 3 to 7 players based on Three Kingdoms era in chinese history.
"Seikiheikuu" means the various size banner hangs, and the sky is covered and hidden. Its words for "The Red Cliffs" by chinese poet Su Shi.

Player control one warlord in the end of Han dynasty.
The turn order of player's operation phase and common administration phase is decided at random.
Leaders ability influences diplomacy and military operations greatly.

The player who controls many provinces is a winner at the end of the game.

This game is supplement of Japanese Tactics Magazine #39, and die-cut counter was sold separately.

Re-implemented by:

Chronicles of the Three Kingdoms

85967.name: Hot Shots Tennis: Get a Grip
85967.description:
User Summary

Hot Shots Tennis: Get a Grip is a tennis game for the Playstation Portable. The game improves on the 2007 game for the PS2. Get a Grip is based around a cast of cartoony characters and allows the player to choose from a number of different shot types. The player can customize their character in single-player mode, which is a world-exploring championship campaign. There are a number of mini-games and challenges that can be played to earn new equipment and accessories. Get a Grip also includes ad-hoc multiplayer competition for up to four players at once.

85968.name: FrontierVille

videogamehonor.29975: 2011 D.I.C.E. Best Social Networking Game/Web Based Game of the Year Nominee

85968.description:
User Summary

FrontierVille is a simulation game hosted on Facebook. FrontierVille shares a number of features and gameplay elements with its predecessor FarmVille. The player takes the role of a pioneer in the American West and can collect sets of items to exchange for experience points, coins, energy, and other items. The player needs to complete a number of different tasks to maintain their homestead. As in FarmVille, the player can plant a number of crops to produce revenue, and their maturation time varies depending on the value of the plant.

85969.name: Ōkamiden

videogamehonor.31892: 2010 Game Critics Best Handheld Game of the Year Nominee

85969.description:
User Summary

Ōkamiden is the DS game that is the sequel to the fantasy title Ōkami. The game centres around Chibiterasu (the child of Ōkami’s protagonist Amaterasu) in the land of Nippon. Nippon has been invaded by demons again and it is up to Chibiterasu to stop them. The art style for Ōkamiden is softer and cuter than the original game, but gameplay is similar. The player will need to travel the land of Nippon and solve puzzles and defeat enemies to advance in the game. Chibiterasu has the Celestial Brush, a key component in Ōkami, to aid him in his endeavors. Many of the puzzles are based on utilizing Chibiraterau’s allies in tandem with the protagonist.

Microbadges

Okamiden fan

85971.name: WinBack 2: Project Poseidon
85971.description:
From the back of the package:

In a world where terror takes on many forms, a new weapon threatens to shake the balance of power. Freedom's last hope rests in the hands of three new operatives who must race against time to recover this doomsday device. The fate of the world hangs by a mere thread and a few ticks of the clock could mean the difference between justice and annihilation.

> Follow up to the smash-hit WindBack; Covert Operations game.

> Innovative "route" system lets you experience each mission from different perspectives.

> 30 intense missions spread across a variety of environments.

> 6 weapon types including the all new sniper rifle

104112.name: Babylon 5 Wars: War of Retribution – Atlas of the Narn-Centauri War Update Pack

85972.description:
This is an expansion for Babylon 5 Wars, first edition.

Information taken from the back of the book

Included:

Maps detailing fleet movements during the war.
Statistics for 36 ships fighters and bases
Sew rules covering space stations, skin dancing, miniatures rules, flint (electronic intelligence) vessels




From the publisher:

This details the conflict fought between the Narn and Centauri during the second season of Babylon 5. Maps of the war, scenarios and expanded ship lists are included, along with new weapons such as the mag gun, guardian array, ion torpedo, matter cannon, and burst beam. Over 30 new ships, fighters and bases are provided, from the mighty Centauri Octurion Battleship to the lowly Narn Sha'Kos Police Cutter, as well as new ship classes like Missile Frigates, Scouts, Escorts, Carriers, Strike Cruisers, Supply Ships, and more!
85972.name: War of Retribution: Atlas of the Narn-Centauri War

85974.name: Baldur's Gate: The Original Saga
85974.description:
User Summary:

A compilation of Baldur's Gate and Baldur's Gate: Tales of the Sword Coast, on three CD's plus 1 soundtrack CD.

From the box back:

In Baldur's Gate (Role Playing Game of the Year, 1998), with its expansion pack Tales of the Sword Coast, deeds are rewarded with vast treasures of legend, glory beyond compare and a world rescued from the brink of disaster!

Unleash your imagination in a fantasy world where heroes use magic, steel and their wits to battle fearsome monsters and unscrupulous villains. Guide your party of adventurers from the bustling medieval city of Baldur's Gate through hundreds of quests and challenges that will take you on a journey that you will not soon forget!


An adventure that spans multiple CD's filled with highly detailed art, incredible music and an epic story.



Dynamic lighting and real-time environmental effects such as rain, snow and lightning.



Create your character from 6 unique races and 26 different classes and subclasses.



Multiplayer support for up to 6 players via modem, LAN or TCP/IP.



Based on the best selling Forgotten Realms campaign setting from Advanced Dungeons & Dragons.

85975.name: EF2000

videogameexpansion.136898: EF2000 TACTCOM Tactical and Communications Upgrade

85975.description:
From the box back:

No tactical jet fighter ever created can match the EF2000 - NATO's answer to the future of air combat, slated for commission at decade's end.

With the aid of the Royal Air force and British Aerospace, Digital Image Design brings this futuristic aircraft to life RIGHT NOW!

At the heart of this break-through title are proprietary polygon-mapping techniques and pristine 3D graphics that redefine the expression "wow".

Real-world flight-dynamics, avionics and authentic missions simply add to the rush of the fastest, most realistic flight sim ever developed.

Up to eight players can engage in simultaneous interactive air-combat in a target-rich environment over a local-access network.

The real thing is still years away...or is it?

85976.name: Rampage World Tour
85976.description:
Up to three simultaneous players control the monsters George (a King Kong-like gorilla), Lizzy (a Godzilla-like dinosaur), or Ralph (a giant werewolf), created from humans who were mutated by experiments conducted at Scumlabs. They need to destroy all buildings in a high-rise city to advance to the next city. On their way they can destroy helicopters, tanks, taxis, police cars, boats, and trolleys, as well as eat people.

Source: Wikipedia, "Rampage World Tour", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

videogame.88603: King's Bounty: Crossworlds: Game of the Year Edition

85977.name: King's Bounty: Crossworlds

videogamecompilation.88603: King's Bounty: Crossworlds: Game of the Year Edition

85977.description:
King’s Bounty: Crossworlds is an expansion to the RPG title King’s Bounty: Armored Princess.

The new release will include the “Orcs on the March” expansion, the two new independent campaigns “Champion of the Arena” and “Defender of the Crown” and a convenient editor with help system. This editor will allow you to create additional content for the game and alter it in any way you wish.

Orcs on the March

The world of Teana is threatened once again. The female orc leader Red Scrounger, craving to gain unlimited power, gathers her army of followers and departs in search of the ancient Source of Immense Force. If her evil plan succeeds Teana will be destroyed, and all its inhabitants will perish. In despair other orc chiefs ask the humans for help. Meanwhile, a mysterious tower appears near the coast of Debir Island and even the greatest magicians of the kingdom cannot figure out how to enter it…

New gameplay features for King's Bounty: Armored Princess
• Nine previously unseen creatures;
• Fifty new items, item sets and artifacts;
• Thirteen magic spells;
• Over fifty new creature abilities;
• New skills for different player classes;
• A network of military academies for training troops;
• Mysterious Mage Tower;
• Unique ability of the orc race – Adrenalin.

Champion of the Arena

Arthur – a young mercenary from the Endoria world – signs a contract with the merchant Lew Klisan. He undertakes the task of winning all of the fights in a gladiatorial arena and bringing the first prize, the Champion’s Belt, to his employer. Unfortunately, the sly merchant did not warn the young man that this arena is located in the enigmatic Litani world and he is expected to fight nightmarish creatures. Arthur will require all his skills to carefully choose his allies, equipment and troops to be able to defeat all eight monstrosities in the Thousand Emperors Arena.
• Five new hero skills
• Eleven armor-bearers,
• Nine guilds of different races – each one has difficult assignments for our hero,
• Eight ferocious Arena bosses,
• Seven unique enemy heroes.

Defender of the Crown

Having defeated the horrific Baal, Princess Amelie is coming home. It looks like the best time to relax and enjoy a tranquil life. The valiant heroine just needs to complete her education, pass her final exam and receive an honorary Defender of the Crown degree. Sounds like a mere formality? Not at all. Amelie needs to do her best, because it is her life at stake in this final trial prepared by the harshest examiners.
• Six fierce battles in unique arenas,
• Three new heroine skills,
• Random enemies and allies.

Campaign editor

This complete toolbox allows you to alter the game and create your own campaigns with a unique story, characters, buildings, items and maps. Comprehensive manual is included on the game DVD.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgamehonor.22017: 2013 Origins Awards Best Historical Board Game Nominee

85978.description:
Expand your copy of Spearpoint 1943 and Spearpoint 1943 Eastern Front with Frontline General: Spearpoint 1943 Village and Defensive Line Map Expansion! This expansion requires the cards from either base game of Spearpoint 1943 and adds new depth to the system, new situations with fictional intros by Mark H. Walker, beautiful Marc von Martial artwork, large die-cut 1" general counters and 4" terrain tiles, printed rules/situation booklet, quick reference and score cards, and a gorgeous two-sided mounted 12"x36" Village / Defensive Line map inspired by 1943 Italian summer and winter terrain.

Features


Take the fast-paced fun of the original two-player 30-minute World War II squad-level tactical card game Spearpoint 1943 to a whole new level!
Play new tense tactical Standard Games and Situations that set up differently every time using versatile die-cut terrain tiles such as buildings, ruins, minefields, bunkers, trenches, and more!
Expansion includes new Situations with fictional introductions by Mark H. Walker.
Beautiful Marc von Martial (cogwheeldesigns.com) component and box artwork.
Adds simple new rules to the Spearpoint 1943 system including movement, line of sight, combat within buildings and structures, artillery spotting, and more!
Adds more tactical challenges for players through new well-tested Situations.
85978.name: Spearpoint 1943: Village and Defensive Line Map Expansion

85979.name: Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West
85979.description:
Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West is a third person shooter delivering an intense team based multiplayer experience.

Relive the violent era of the Wild West as it ought to be with adrenaline fuelled action and fast paced gunfights.

Some of the key features are:

Multiplayer, team based shooter

No other game in the genre takes team work to such a level as Lead and Gold – Gangs of the Wild West does. Game modes, archetype design and game mechanics are all focusing on team play.

A varied character/profession design with a diverse level up system and unique traits

Each of the player classes are designed to use their unique weaponry and traits to form a gang that is stronger than its individual members, a sum greater than the parts.
A wide variety of maps and game modes is included.
Maps and game modes are designed to fit into an iconic western setting.

Source: The Game Website.

85980.name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest (Wii/PS3)
85980.description:
For the first time, The Lord of the Rings comes to the Wii and PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system with a game built from the ground up to take full advantage of motion controls – delivering action packed motion-controlled sword, bow and horseback combat gameplay.

Take on the role of the legendary Aragorn as you embark on his greatest quests and engage in his greatest battles from The Lord of the Rings film trilogy.

Features:

Play as Aragorn – Play as the legendary Aragorn as you embark on his greatest quests from the Lord of the Rings trilogy. Wild his sword, bow or spear through action-packed battles against Sauron’s forces and fierce creatures from Tolkien’s fabled Middle-Earth. Through your quest, you’ll join forces with the Fellowship and other friendly forces to overcome enemies and complete mission objectives.

Co-op Gameplay – Team up with a friend to adventure through the entire game together via same-screen Co-Op. Together as Aragorn & Galdalf you’ll wield mighty swords and summon magical power against the minions of Sauron.

Player Upgrades – Discover new skills, powerful weapons and armor as Aragorn journeys through the game. Unlock powerful upgrades by purchasing them with silver coins.

Authentic LOTR experience – Relive an inspired retelling of Aragorn’s heroic adventure featuring missions, storylines, characters & environments based on the fiction/world of Peter Jackson’s LOTR Film Trilogy.

The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn’s Quest is also available for the Nintendo DS, Playstation 2 computer entertainment system, and PSP (Playstation Portable) system – featuring action/combat oriented gameplay with unique level design and content created specifically for those platforms.

Source: The Game Website.

85982.name: Tortured Souls! (Issue 1 - Oct/Nov 1983)
85982.description:
From the back cover:

This issue of Tortured Souls! contains the following scenarios:

The Chevalier's Shrine: Something is amiss at the memorial shrine, and the party are hired to investigate further - will they discover the sinister secret in time? Contains alternative versions for beginnins or experienced players.

Tomb of Qadir: Explore beneath the goblin lair in a search for the hidden tomb! The first of the scenarios in the Zhalindor Campaign: these pull out modules are independently playable or can be used as a challenging series for the experienced player.

The Rising Tower: The second scenario from the Zhalindor Campaign. A stronghold of fire giants pose initial problems for a higher level party, but the survivors must face a greater peril!

The Crystal Keys: A complete ready-to-play solo adventure. The penniless party must scour a forbidding wilderness to locate the dungeon containing Zamhardrar's legendary hoard with its fearsome guardians!

85983.name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest (DS/PS2/PSP)
85983.description:
From the Game Website:

The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn’s Quest is for the Nintendo DS, Playstation 2 computer entertainment system, and PSP (Playstation Portable) system features action/combat oriented gameplay with unique level design and content created specifically for the platforms.

Take on the role of the legendary Aragorn as you embark on his greatest quests and engage in his greatest battles from The Lord of the Rings film trilogy.

Features:

Play as Aragorn – Play as the legendary Aragorn as you embark on his greatest quests from the Lord of the Rings trilogy. Wild his sword, bow or spear through action-packed battles against Sauron’s forces and fierce creatures from Tolkien’s fabled Middle-Earth.

Level Design – Uniquely designed levels to take advantage of view perspective, ease of navigation, exploration, and handheld oriented controls.

Robust Character Development – Upgradeable armor, combat & abilities, allowing players to customize Aragorn’s abilities to suit their preferred combat style, providing strategic depth.

Arena Challenge Levels – Set within key locations of Middle-Earth, complete a wide variety of challenges (defeating ambushes set by orcs, slaying fierce creatures, etc.) to earn special unlockables that they can be used in story mode.

85984.name: Tortured Souls! (Issue 2 - Dec/Jan 1983/4)
85984.description:
From the back cover:

What's in this issue ?

Shrine of the Phoenix: A high level AD&D mini-scenario for use as a wilderness diversion, or as an overground for a dungeon of the DM's own construction.

The Great Jebezan Camel Caper: On holiday in the desert city of Jebeza, the party are suddenly plummeted into a web of murder, intrigue and Formula 1 camel racing.

Ataa's Mouth: A low level Zhalindor Campaign module in which the party must fight the effects of a hideous disease before discovering the secret of the caveman lair.

Raid on Erivaan: A medium level party adventuring in the Zhalindor Campaign stumble across a lizard man war-band intent on razing the village of Erivaan to the ground. Will the party come to the aid of the elven inhabitants, or will they join with the lizard men in the hope of locating the rumored elf riches?

Brohar's Bane: The demon Brohar has risen again, and the party have only 17 hours in which to find the means of his nemesis in this AD&D solo wilderness adventure.

85985.name: Dune Variant Cards
85985.description:
A set of 8 new Dune Treachery cards printed on 1 sheet of cardstock with 2 pages of accompanying rules. These novels have precedent in the books or movie. These cards are:

Weather Scanner, Smuggler, Troop Carrier, Dust Chasm, Juice of Sapho, Imperial Conditioning, Break Imperial Conditioning, Weirding Way.

These were published in The VIP of Gaming Magazine, Issue #2 Feb/Mar 1986

85987.name: David Robinson's Supreme Court
85987.description:
David Robinson Supreme Court is a Sega Genesis video game that received lukewarm praise during its release in the early 1990s. The name is based on former NBA player David Robinson and features four different fictional teams from the United States of America. This game was developed with the help of the late Mark Haigh-Hutchinson from the United Kingdom. In Japan, this game was released as David Robinson Basketball (デビッド・ロビンソン バスケットボール)

There are three modes: exhibition, playoffs, and role-playing mode. Winning the role-playing mode allows the player to play against an all-star team of players chosen by David Robinson himself. The view is diagonal with all directions of the Sega Genesis controller being used. David Robinson was in his prime when the game was released.

However, the game was not released without major bugs. When playing in a tournament, using too many timeouts could freeze the game. This would require a hard reset in order to restart the game. Despite using David Robinson's name and using most of rules of basketball, a legitimate license from the NBA was never granted. All players and teams are fictional and the coaches and the league commissioner are nameless.

Source: Wikipedia, "David Robinson's Supreme Court", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

85988.name: Era Of Inventions: The Golden Goal
85988.description:
The Golden Goal is a small expansion for the game Era of Inventions. The expansion adds some wealth to the success of those who are ambitious, but also helps those who have bad luck in being a successful inventor!

Materials: a golden token
Preperation: at the beginning of the game, place the golden token on square 5 of the influence track

Rules: the first player who reaches or passes by square 5 gets directly 1 golden coin, and the player (or players) who are lowest on the influence track directly receive 1 cube of free choice (white, purple, grey, black or blank) out of the general reserve.

After these bonuses, the golden token is immediately placed on square 10 of the influence track, after which the same rules as above are applied. At any way, after the golden token has been reached it is moved 5 squares further on the influence track (so, from 5 to 10, from 10 to 15, from 15 to 20, and so on).

source: from the rulebook

85990.description:
There has long been a debate in the scientific community: Which creature is mightier, the Whale or the Giant Squid? At long last, you can decide! The Whale and the Giant Squid are pitted against each other here in battle!

But wait… Will they attack each other? Or will they attack your poor escaping people and their boats? Let the battles begin!

In “Survive: The Giant Squid” mini-expansion for “Survive: Escape From Atlantis!”, players add an additional creature, The Giant Squid… and it is hungry! With its long tentacles, The Giant Squid can not only reach into boats to attack people, but it can also reach onto land to chomp on people, making your opponents’ people on land vulnerable as well! The Giant Squid adds a whole new twist to the great game of “Survive Escape From Atlantis!”

NOTE: You must have the base game Survive: Escape from Atlantis! to enjoy this expansion.
85990.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis! The Giant Squid Mini Expansion

85991.name: Mis Pecados... El juego de la verdad
85991.description:
In this game you have to say if its true or not, some sex related actions printed in the cards.
Depending on each card you'll have to drink a beer, change your place to someone else, move forward to the score table, etc.

For example a couple cards:

"I've never seen porn" If you say True, you have to drink, if you say False, you don't have to answer next question.

"I've never cheated on someone" If you say True, move 1 forward, if you say false, tell us with who and when!!!

85992.name: Kaiten Sushi
85992.description: Players using chopsticks to remove wooden sushi from a central board. The score penalty if they lose the sushi on the way. If they don't, they put them on their own board, trying to from combinations of certain colours (Each sushi has a colour). In total its a cross between tile placing and dexterity.

85993.name: Bamogo
85993.description:
Abstract Two-Player Game. Each player tries to connect two sides. The 16 playing pieces have three colours, 5 of two colors and six for the third.

Players either put two stones with different colours on adjacent places on the board or switch the position of two adjacent stones.

A connection can be made with any colour. First one to make the connection wins.

85995.name: Dinomeal
85995.description:
Dino eggs of other dinosaurs stolen. Do you dare to get back the eggs?

Throw the dice to see which egg you have to tackle. But make sure that the dinosaur doesn't get you because then he comes to get you. When the dinosaur attacks you are out of the game. The last winner in the game wins.

(source: from the publishers website)

85996.name: Ivy The Kiwi?
85996.description:
From the back of the box:

"Play the new platformer from the creator of Sonic!

Help Ivy find her way home!

Use your Wii Remote to stretch protective vines across your screen, guiding Ivy as she climbs, bounces, spins and smashes her way past obstacles!

Dash through over 100 challenging stages filled with foes and hazards. Stretch a vine like a slingshot, then smash Ivy through cracked bricks.

Get 2,3, or 4 friends together for frantic multi-player action."

85997.name: Fragile Dreams: Farewell Ruins of the Moon
85997.description:
Introduction in the game manual:

In a future not too far from now, the human race has become an endangered species, and the planet is now a wasteland of moldering ruins and lonely ghosts.

Without humans to maintain their creations, all that they had built is slowly begun to rot away. Everything is silently relinquishing itself to the unyielding forces of nature.

For as far back as he could remember Seto lived in an abandoned observatory with a mysterious old man. In the summer of his fifteenth year, the old man peacefully passed away, leaving Seto completely alone.

With the only person he had ever known gone, Seto decided to head out into the world, keeping the old man's last promising words in his heart: You are not alone. With that, he set out to find others like him.

In a land that only responds with the lonely echo of his voice, Seto sets out on a journey in the hopes that there is someone, anyone out there ... waiting for him.

85998.name: Knowledge Arcana (Issue 6 -  Summer 2006)
85998.description:
Issue 6 of Knowledge Arcana

Cover art by Julia Bax

85999.name: Black Stories Stadt-Land-Tod
85999.description:
"Black stories: Stadt-Land-Tod" is a very fast game that can be played with at least 2 players. Theoretically an unlimited number of players can join the game - the only limiting factor is the number of pencils and sheets of paper you have at hand.

In each round a letter is randomly determined. Then each player writes down a substantive for each word category that start with the determined letter.

The categories are (among others): Place of murder, weapon, escape vehicle. They are predetermined on the sheets that come with the game.

The first player who manages to find a word for each category stops the round and the results from all players are compared.

For each word a player wrote he gets points: 5 if other players wrote the same word / 10 if no one else thought of this word.

Example:
Random letter: C

Anna wrote for the category "escape vehicle": car
Bob wrote: cab
Roy wrote: car

Anna and Roy get 5 points each. Bob gets 10 points.

After this the next round begins.

The game can continue as long as the players agree on.
Finally all points are summarized and the player with the most points wins.

This game is the "black stories" variant of a classical game called "Stadt, Land, Fluss" (City, Country, River) which is played by almost every child in Germany (e.g. at school during breaks).



============================

From the publisher website:

Duisburg, Dänemark und Donau waren gestern- in dieser blturünstigen Version des Klassikers " Stadt Land Fluss" geht es um Mordmotive, Tatwaffen und Fluchtfahrzeuge.
50 Blatt mit Spielanleitung

Translation:

Duisburg, Dänemark and Donau were yesterday - in this bloodthirsty edition of the German classic "Stadt, Land, Fluss" (categories) it's all about murder reasons, weapons and escape vehicles.
50 playing sheets and manual

86000.name: Towers of Illusion
86000.description:
Look!... Now Look Again! What you see (or don't see) determines your path to the top! Science Art magic and philosophy are intertwined in the "seeing" of visual illusions. Towers of Illusion examines perception through dozens of visual oddities. The accompanying text carefully explains the dynamic of each illusion, so players are entertained and educated. With more than one way to play, this game delights children and adults.

Game Mechanics:

Roll the die and move your Jester accordingly. If you land on a step with a path symbol on it, take a card and read the question on the front of the card out loud. Answer the question. Depending upon what you see in the optical illusion at that moment, turn the card over and follow the directions based upon what you saw. Do the game when landing on a step with a key symbol. When you reach the top of the tower, you obtain a treasure coin. Obtain three treasure coins (one each of the three types of treasure coins) and win.

General Information:

It appears that the game was sold through the Museum of Fine Arts Boston, MA.

Contents:

Three Towers, Six Jester Player Pieces, One Die, 18 Treasure Coins, 198 Optical Illusion Cards and on the back side of these cards are the Key Cards (66) and Path Cards (132), 18 Lose a Turn Cards, 18 Extra Turn Cards, Eight Clips to Hold the Towers Together
